com.connectlife.coreserver.config

Interface Config

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigSqlite

    public interface Config
    Interface of the manager of configuration in the application. This manager can store and reload configuration.
    Author:
    ericpinet
    2015-10-17

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigItem getConfig(String _section, String _item)
      Return a ConfigItem object that correspond to this section and item.

      Return all ConfigItem object in the application.

      Initialization of the module
      boolean isInit()
      Return if the module is correctly running.
      boolean RestoreFactory()
      Restore the factory configurations of system.

      Set new value for a config and save.
      void unInit()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        boolean init()
        Initialization of the module
        Returns:
        True if initialization completed correctly.

      • isInit

        boolean isInit()
        Return if the module is correctly running.
        Returns:
        True if the module is correctly running.

      • unInit

        void unInit()
        Unload the module. After, it's possible to init again.

      • getConfig

        ConfigItem getConfig(String _section,
                     String _item)
        Return a ConfigItem object that correspond to this section and item.
        Parameters:
        _section - Section of the configuration.
        _item - Item of the configuraiton.
        Returns:
        ConfigItem object or null.

      • getConfigs

        List<ConfigItem> getConfigs()
        Return all ConfigItem object in the application.
        Returns:

      • setConfig

        Set new value for a config and save.
        Parameters:
        _object - ConfigItem objecto to save in configuration.
        Returns:
        True if configuration was correctly updated.

      • RestoreFactory

        boolean RestoreFactory()
        Restore the factory configurations of system.
        Returns:
        True if the restoration is completed successfully.
